short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick launcher for Pabu's Press, a library of the mind.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A quick access tool for the library of posts at Pabu's Press (www.pabuspress.co.za).

FEATURES:

• View the most recent posts and open them on www.pabuspress.co.za directly from the extension.

• Quick launch my blog's homepage and gain immediate access to high quality stories, poetry, essays and more.

• Direct links to my newsletter sign up and social media accounts.

This extension requires an internet connection for its functionality as it pulls JSON data from the parent website https://pabupress.co.za to access the latest posts as well as to meaningfully redirect you to the news letter sign up and social links.


PRIVACY POLICY:

This extension will not collect any your information in any way.
https://pabuspress.co.za/extension-privacy-policy
